"I see... Well maam, if you see another suspicious activity, you can report to us again," the female said, pocketing her notepad.

"Thank you very much, officers. I am sorry for the trouble. Would you like to come in and have a cup of tea? Coffee maybe?"

"Thank you very much for your offer maam, but we are on duty right now. We'll take our leave, then," said the female cop.

"Oh, then please wait here a minute. Please," James said as he turned around and jogged to the kitchen.

Jane was happened to buy a dozen of donuts earlier today, and she had just re-heated them on the microwave before James took over. James took a small paper bag from a shelf and put 4 donuts in it, then ran back to the front door.

"Here, please take this. They are still warm, but you can eat them whenever," James said, holding out the paper bag towards the female cop.

"Well, we will take it then"

As she grabbed the bag, James casually brushed his fingers over the cop's hand, subtle enough that her partner didn't see it, but enough for James to transfer himself to his new body. James smiled as he saw the bewildered Jane.

"Thank you and stay safe, maam," James' new partner said, replied by stuttering approval from Jane as she closed the door.

They walked back to patrol car and put on their seat belt. Soon after the car drove off, James rolled up the paper bag and peered inside.

"What do we have there, Al?" The male co asked.

"Several donuts, Lex. Do you want some?" James replied.

"Maybe later..." he said, focusing on the road.

James, or now Alliana smiled at his partner Alex. He picked a donut and started munching. He liked his new body so far. It felt lighter and more fit than the two mother-daughter earlier. Looking down, James saw that Alli's breast were a little too small for his taste, but he could cope with it. Unfortunately, he couldn't feel his body around with Alex driving beside him. James paid attention to Alex as he devoured his second donut. Alex didn't look like an overly built muscle cop like in some movies, but he sure looked like he spent a lot of time at a gym.

As he finished his donut, James remembered that after coming to Jane's house, Alex and Alliana...
1432.title: From criminal to a cop

144.content:
As he walked out of Jane's house, James enjoyed in his own perverted little way how his borrowed breasts jiggled ever so slightly as he walked. Thinking to himself of how amazing his new power was, he turned the corner, and found himself looking at a gigantic mansion. Impressive as it was, it also seemed... familiar.

"Now where have I seen this place before?" James wondered to himself as he walked up to the gates. Wondering how he was going to get past it, he noticed a small intercom installed on the wall. Pressing on it with his new manicured fingers, he said in his now high-pitched voice, "Excuse me, will you please open the gate for me?"

The reply came back in a very bored male voice, "State your name and business."

Caught off guard, James quickly recovered and said, "I'm Jane Dover, here to pay her neighbour a visit."

"I'm sorry ma'am but you have to have an appointment to see the mayor. He's a very busy man and we can't just let anybody in."

The mayor! So that's why it was such a gigantic abode with so much security. However, with his new power, James knew that breaking in would be a breeze. After all, he just had to be one of the people who stayed inside and he would have every reason to enter. Now he just had to figure out how he was going to gain access to one of those people...
144.title: Meeting the neighbors.

1442.content:
As Jane, James was not going to make it very far but he didn't have to be Jane. He could just find one of the workers hired by the mayor's family and he would be able to go wherever he wanted. Walking around the compound, he soon spotted an elderly gardener trimming away dutifully at a hedge. Walking closer, James called out to him as he snipped away. The gardener looked up in surprise and waved back, wondering what the pretty lady could possibly want with an old man like him.

James walked until the only thing separating the two of them was the metal railings and the hedge. "Hi," he began.

The old man tipped his hat towards James as a form of greeting, "Good afternoon ma'am."

"I was wondering, could you help me with something?"

"I'm not entirely sure ma'am but I'll try my best."

"Well, you should at least know my name, I'm Jane," James said as he stuck his hand through the railing.

The old man was a bit surprised but took the bait and shook her hand vigorously. Seizing the opportunity, James quickly transferred from Jane into the old man.

After getting over the initial nausea, James looked up now as the old man to see the woman looking around, confused.

"Thanks for the lift lady!" James said in his host's new gruff voice as he chuckled to himself. Stroking his new beard, he carelessly dropped the clippers on the ground and started making his way towards the house.
1442.title: Asking assistance from the staff

14423.content:
James walked as quickly as his new aged body permitted him to do so. It was not easy moving about as an old man but he knew that it would be over soon when he transferred into the mayor's body. Thinking about all the things he could do as the mayor, James almost blew his cover by suddenly bursting into laughter before calming himself down in a matter of seconds. The other workers just put it to old Howard's eccentricity, the head gardener could be a bit odd sometimes but he was a great boss and friendly person.

As Howard, James walked up to the front door and rang the door bell. When the mayor opened it, James grinned widely to himself.

"Evening Mr.Mayor!" He said, adopting his host's mannerisms.

The mayor privately wondered why his head gardener was ringing his doorbell but after nearly 40 years of loyal service, he supposed he owed it as a favour to him. "Good evening Mr.Gibson, how may I help you today?"

"Well Mr. Mayor, I had a question about the new hire."

"What new hire? I haven't hired anyone in the last six months!"

"You haven't? Then why did the lad say that you had hired him and I was supposed to show him around?"

"I never did such a thing! What's the name of this young man?"

Giggling slightly to himself, James said, "He said his name was James sir. If you want to meet him, he's working on the hedges over there." He held out a finger to the distant side of the courtyard.

As the mayor stepped out of the house to get a closer look at this supposed adolescent worker, James quickly put his hand on the mayor's back and made the switch. In an instant, he felt himself now wearing a silky black suit with a crisp dress shirt and tie. Turning around, he smiled at his old host and who was now his head gardener. "Good evening Mr. Gibson, how may I help you today?" repeating what the mayor had said to him while he was possessing Howard.

Howard looked extremely confused and quickly excused himself, muttering something about getting too old for the job. Chuckling to himself, James closed the door behind him as he entered the mayor's house. Tonight was certainly going to be very, very fun.
14423.title: Getting in

info.brief_description: A criminal gains the ability to jump from body to body with only a touch.
info.description:
James Corben had been a normal man until the day he lost his job. Not long after his wife, Alice, left him taking their 5-year-old daughter Danielle with her. Depressed, jobless, alone and angry at the world he slipped into a haze of alcohol before eventually slipping into a life of crime; breaking and entering, petty theft and muggings were the order of the day for the next ten years. Unfortunately one night he had attempted to mug a woman who turned out to be an undercover cop and ran eventually running into the large county park on the edge of the city. There he tripped, hit his head on a rock and died at the age of 44.

However while this would be the end of most stories it was not the end of James' as the next day a group of teenagers camping in the forest discovered his body and when one of them attempted to touch it, James' spirit shot into his body taking control of it. He would find out later that he could move from one body to another by touch but our story begins with that first fateful possession...

Rules
The general rules that one comes to expect apply. Try to keep the storyline coherent, try to make sure spelling and grammar remains reasonably good so chapters remain readable; I can fix simple mistakes but if they're excessive in a way that's distracting the chapter may be deleted.

Likewise try and have some actual content. About two paragraphs is sufficient. Any chapters that are simply one or two sentences will be deleted.

James can only possess people. Not animals, not inanimate objects, only other people. He can control whether or not he jumps into a body when touching someone and when possessing them he gains instant access to all of their memories in order to effectively "be" them if he so chooses. Likewise James exists only as a spirit as his physical body is dead and thus unusable.

James is a character with no particular morals. As he was a loser and a criminal in life, his death left him feeling bitter, hateful and resentful at the world. With his new power, he feels that he can get revenge and do anything he wants without impunity and thus he can, and most likely will, abuse his power for whatever desires he may have no matter how depraved.

If I feel that new rules or anything of that nature needs to be specified I'll add it here. Otherwise enjoy and be sure to add.
